document_name: Decree no. 2012-1049 (creating the National Commission for the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from deforestation and forest degradation)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CIV/2012/CIV-2012-10-24-Decree no. 2012-1049 (creating the National Commission for the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from deforestation and forest degradation)_e56df05f11ee6e5d24aac48c0968fda4.pdf
document_description:
This decree creates the National Commission for the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from deforestation and forest degradation (CN-REDD+) and sets its functioning mechanisms and missions.

CN-REDD+ is notably in charge of defning orientations and reviewing the REDD+ programme in Ivory Coast, and to set up a national fund for REDD+.
